localizedMeta.description:
It is the love adventure game for women which made the South Korean Seoul the stage.
A game is performed by screen touch operation.
The language to support is only Japanese.

You who visited South Korea by the school trip of the high school life last.
You who met three good-looking-men K-POP Starr and others at the Incheon airport.
The school trip which can enjoy love and a travel will be passed.

Package size: 81 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen

Supported languages:
Japanese

Copyright 2013 kouwasangyou All Rights Reserved.

It is the love adventure game for women which made the South Korean Seoul the stage.
A game is performed by screen touch operation.
The language to support is only Japanese.

You who visited South Korea by the school trip of the high school life last.
You who met three good-looking-men K-POP Starr and others at the Incheon airport.
The school trip which can enjoy love and a travel will be passed.

Package size: 81 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen

Copyright 2013 kouwasangyou All Rights Reserved.

韓国ソウルを舞台にした、女性向け恋愛アドベンチャーゲームです。
ゲームは画面タッチ操作で行います。
サポートする言語は日本語のみです。

高校生活最後の修学旅行で、韓国を訪れた主人公。
仁川空港で３人のイケメンＫ－ＰＯＰスターたちと出会った主人公（あなた）は、
恋に旅行に、波乱に満ちた修学旅行を過ごすことになっていく・・・。

コンテンツ容量: 81 MB

プレイ人数: 1人

対応機能:
- タッチスクリーン

対応言語:
日本語

著作権等:
Copyright 2013 kouwasangyou All Rights Reserved.
